001package gbw.melange.common.events.observability;
002
003import gbw.melange.common.events.observability.filters.IFilterChain;
004
005/**
006 * An Observer pattern employing an Intercepting Filters pattern to handle observers.
007 *
008 * @param <T> Type of value held by this observable
009 * @param <R> Type of on change filters applicable to this observable
010 * @param <U> Type of identifier for each filter.
011 * @author GustavBW
012 * @version $Id: $Id
013 */
014public interface IObservableValue<T, R extends UndeterminedBiConsumer<T>, U> {
015    /**
016     * Retrieves the current value.
017     *
018     * @return a T object
019     */
020    T get();
021
022    /**
023     * The filter chain is only run when this function evaluates to false. <br/>
024     * Meaning providing this function with (old, newer) -> true will have it run everytime the
025     * value is set.
026     *
027     * @param newFunc a {@link gbw.melange.common.events.observability.EqualityFunction} object
028     */
029    void changeEqualityFunction(EqualityFunction<T> newFunc);
030
031    /**
032     * <p>onChange.</p>
033     *
034     * @return Returns the on change consumers applied to this observable value.
035     */
036    IFilterChain<R,U> onChange();
037}
